q: Eric Schmidt would clear$ 334 million on his stock sale were it all to take place at Thursday's prices. Of course, it's not that he wants the money or anything. Using this trading plan, Eric Schmidt can diversify his investment portfolio and can spread stock trades out over a period of one year to reduce market impact, Google said. "Because this trading plan was established well in advance of a trade, it also helps avoid concerns about whether Eric Schmidt had material, non-public information when he made a decision to sell his stock.
